lead_paragraph: The matter of whether to limit New York City politicians to two terms in office has been largely ignored despite the outrage that seized the city two years ago.
snippet: The matter of whether to limit New York City politicians to two terms in office has been largely ignored despite the outrage that seized the city two years ago.

headline.main: Term Limits Are Popular but Draw Less Fervor
headline.seo: N.Y.C. Term Limits Are on Ballot, but Not Hot Issue
headline.print_headline: Term Limits Are Popular But Draw Less Fervor
